column3: Concept ACK.  I think this will make writing/updating the tests less error-prone and more readable.\n

Rebased.\nIf people like this change, I think it would make sense to merge it sooner rather than later as it will really help with the merge conflicts between #6898 , #7008 , and #6915 which will hopefully all be in for 0.12.\n
ACK, nice work.  Agree that this would be nice to merge soon.\n
